nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Lost Command

Star Wars: Darth Vader and the Lost Command is a five-issue comic book miniseries from Dark Horse Comics written by Haden Blackman. The first issue was released on January 26, 2011 and the last on May 25, 2011.
Vader must journey into the Ghost Nebula to recover somebody near and dear to his nemesis, Grand Moff Tarkin.
